description:
At last, the game with the Eastern Federation begins.  It`s a first person shooter held in virtual space.  Through a variety of strategies, they manage to match the overwhelmingly powerful Izuna.  However, their perfect attack is easily dodged, and suddenly they`re in huge danager.  As things get worse, Shiro takes a hit meant for Sora.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 誘導法[キリング・ジャイアント]
